Subject: JUnit and versions end of life and support




Hi,
I have a questi=
on on JUnit versions I hope you can help or point me to someone who can pro=
vide answers.
I would like to know the end of life and end of regular suppo=
rt for versions 4.12 and 4.11.
Can we expect the versions mentioned to be a=
round by 2022? Or we will have newer versions.
How often do we have a major=
 version?


Your answers will help me in planning the usage/upgrades of thi=
s software.


Many thanks in advance,
Ardeshir.

--_000_DM2PR09MB039938F50515BF6724B8BD7C9E730DM2PR09MB0399namp_
